hero.title: Modern Fleet Management for the Digital Age
hero.description: Track, manage, and optimize your fleet with real-time GPS tracking, intelligent analytics, and automated maintenance scheduling.

features.title: Everything You Need to Manage Your Fleet
features.subtitle: Powerful features to streamline your operations

tracking.title: Real-Time Tracking
tracking.description: Monitor your entire fleet's location with precision GPS tracking and live updates every 30 seconds.

geofencing.title: Smart Geofencing
geofencing.description: Create custom zones and get instant alerts when vehicles enter or exit designated areas.

maintenance.title: Maintenance Management
maintenance.description: Never miss scheduled maintenance with automated reminders and comprehensive service history.

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.description: Make data-driven decisions with detailed reports on fuel consumption, driver behavior, and route efficiency.

mobile.title: Mobile Application
mobile.description: Drivers can access trip information, checklists, and communicate seamlessly through our mobile app.

alerts.title: Intelligent Alerts
alerts.description: Stay informed with customizable alerts for speeding, harsh braking, idling, and maintenance needs.

testimonials.title: Trusted by Industry Leaders
testimonials.subtitle: See what our customers say about us

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Fleet Management?
cta.description: Join thousands of companies using our platform to reduce costs, improve efficiency, and enhance safety.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your fleet size

questions.question: What's included in the free trial?
questions.answer: The 30-day free trial includes full access to all Pro features, including real-time tracking, geofencing, maintenance scheduling, and advanced analytics. No credit card required.

questions.question: Can I change plans later?
questions.answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate any charges.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers for annual subscriptions.

questions.question: Is there a setup fee?
questions.answer: No setup fees! You only pay for your monthly or annual subscription based on your chosen plan.

questions.question: What kind of support do you offer?
questions.answer: We offer email support for all plans, priority support for Professional plans, and dedicated phone support with a custom SLA for Enterprise customers.

questions.question: Can I add more vehicles later?
questions.answer: Absolutely! You can easily add more vehicles to your account. If you exceed your plan's limit, we'll help you upgrade to the appropriate tier.

features.title: Comprehensive Fleet Management Features
features.subtitle: All the tools you need in one powerful platform

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower businesses with cutting-edge technology that transforms fleet management from a cost center into a competitive advantage.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where every fleet operates at peak efficiency, safety, and sustainability through intelligent automation and data-driven insights.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously push boundaries to deliver the most advanced fleet management solutions.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: Our platform delivers 99.9% uptime, ensuring your fleet never goes dark.

customerSuccess.title: Customer Success
customerSuccess.description: Your success is our success. We're committed to helping you achieve your goals.
